source.8224c038: from rx import of, operators as op
source.9edc61de:
Fruits.pipe(
    op.group_by(lambda s: len(s)),
    op.flat_map(lambda grp: grp.pipe(op.to_list()))  
).subscribe(lambda i: print(i))
